name: Fishing Craze!
description:
Are you ready to become a legendary fisherman? Show off your abilities and increase your income by catching fish. 
As your income increases, improve your boat and your merits. You can catch the mysterious fish of the sea! 
Keep playing to reach the biggest fish and become the legend of the fisherman!
publishers: CORE DIJITAL TASARIM YAZILIM DANISMANLIK ANONIM SIRKETI
